text: læa phwk khea midi hı khwam ying hıy dæ xallxhˌ xan phung mi tx phraxngkh xyang thæcring læa phændin ni thanghmd pen pheiyng ka phrahatth hnung khxng phraxngkh nı wan ki ya mahˌ læa chan fa thanghlay ca mwn kling dwy phrahatth khwa khxng phraxngkh mha brisuththi ying dæ phraxngkh læa phraxngkh thrng sungsng henux cak sing thi phwk khea tang phakhi
